name: Node Minigame - Event Horizon: New Gyr
name_original: Node Minigame - Event Horizon: New Gyr
description: Play the hacking minigame that players in Event Horizon: New Gyr had to tackle! This game was hosted in three 'puzzle boxes,' of sorts, called Nodes. Teams had to get control over all 3 to secure the Interplanetary Network, but that was no simple task - they had to solve a number of physical puzzles and these digital hacking puzzles to complete their objectives.
